DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: Description of the dataset reference for informational purposes.

DocAttribute.Name: Filter
DocAttribute.Documentation: An optional text as e.g. SQL, XQuery etc to filter out data when only a subset is relevant for the dataset reference.

DocAttribute.Name: DatasetRefForObjects
DocAttribute.Documentation: The dataset reference with which objects are associated.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: A name should only be given, if no dataset information (including the dataset name) is attached.
